meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of paedogenetic processes.
meanings.sent1: The paedogenetically altered tadpoles developed faster than the others.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the paedogenetically modified plants in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The paedogenetically enhanced fruit tasted sweeter than usual.
meanings.sent4: Her garden bloomed with paedogenetically nurtured flowers.
meanings.sent5: The paedogenetically influenced behavior of the animals was fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: In a paedogenetic manner or fashion.
meanings.sent1: The tadpoles grew paedogenetically, skipping the usual stages.
meanings.sent2: The plant grew paedogenetically, showing unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: She danced paedogenetically, moving with youthful energy.
meanings.sent4: The idea spread paedogenetically through the community.
meanings.sent5: The story unfolded paedogenetically, revealing surprises at every turn.
